fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, you may choose to assemble your gun at a player's house. If they are attacked tonight, that attack rampages, with you and the attacker both being immune from this rampage.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While you control The Psychopath, your visits are astral. If your gun is ready, you may target an additional player to attack.
- Once you have assembled your gun three times, it permanently becomes ready.
Kill Note Addition:
*The note is written in simple yet elegantly precise handwriting. It reads:*

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure only you and your emotions remain.
